name: Construction City (itch)
description:
Drive around at high speeds in an infinitely generated city.
Press the page up and page down button to adjust your engine power, which is shown in the bottom left under your speed. Press r, backspace, or esc to reset the map.

Note: As this is a very early prototype, this version is much different than the release version will be, as one of the main game mechanics is still missing. In the release version there will not be infinite cities, but instead an expandable city; there will also be a bit less control over the engine power.

Credits:
